author: jonesde
msg: Added feature to entity engine to support generic audit log that can be used for any field; values are converted to a string and l using the enable-audit-log attribute on the entity->field element; the Testing entity uses it now for the testName; this also has functionality to associate user info like the userLoginId with the thread so that the EE knows about it automatically, and uses a stack for flexibility
